## isIntegerTextureFormat() function

Check whether a given texture format is integer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isIntegerTextureFormat(format: TextureFormat): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | [TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md) | The texture format to be checked. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture format is integer, otherwise false
